impact.motivation: The article reports a significant asset sale and dividend increase for Ready Capital Corp., directly impacting its financial metrics and shareholder value.

article_node.title: Bulk Asset Sale Drives Ready Capital Dividend Growth and Stabilization
article_node.summary: Ready Capital Corp. sold $494 million of legacy multifamily bridge assets, netting $85 million in proceeds that should lift its net interest margin and support a higher dividend yield of 11.79%. The sale, announced on Aug 8 2025, also includes acquisition of a Portland mixed‑use asset, avoiding foreclosure costs. The company expects modest earnings growth in H2 2025 from new originations, asset stabilization, and increased SBA 7(a) lending. Shares traded at $4.24 on Aug 28 2025.
